datasets.name: ff9c77ee
datasets.query:
WITH book_borrow_counts AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        book_title,
        COUNT(DISTINCT transaction_id) AS borrow_count
    FROM 
        `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table
    -- Remove the date filter if not needed
    -- WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2023-10-01' AND '2023-10-31' -- Example hardcoded date range
    GROUP BY 
        department, book_title
),
ranked_books AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        borrow_count,
        book_title,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY borrow_count DESC) AS rank
    FROM 
        book_borrow_counts
)
SELECT 
    department,
    book_title,
    borrow_count,
    rank
FROM 
    ranked_books
WHERE 
    rank <=50 -- Top 10 books per department
ORDER BY 
    department, rank;

datasets.name: dff0f5a5
datasets.query:
SELECT CASE 
            WHEN student_year = 1 THEN '1st'
            WHEN student_year = 2 THEN '2nd'
            WHEN student_year = 3 THEN '3rd'
            WHEN student_year = 4 THEN '4th'
            ELSE CONCAT(COALESCE(student_year, 'Unknown'), 'th Year') 
        END AS student_year, department, round(AVG(delay_days)) AS avg_delay 
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table 
WHERE delay_days > 0 
GROUP BY student_year, department

datasets.name: e5d79117
datasets.query:
WITH ranked_students AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        section,
        CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name) AS student_fullname_year,
        CASE 
            WHEN student_year = 1 THEN '1st Year'
            WHEN student_year = 2 THEN '2nd Year'
            WHEN student_year = 3 THEN '3rd Year'
            WHEN student_year = 4 THEN '4th Year'
            ELSE CONCAT(COALESCE(student_year, 'Unknown'), 'th Year') 
        END AS student_year,
        COUNT(CASE WHEN delay_days > 0 THEN 1 END) AS delay_count,
        
        -- Department-wise ranking
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY department 
            ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN delay_days > 0 THEN 1 END) DESC
        ) AS department_delay_rank,

        -- Year-wise ranking
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (
            PARTITION BY student_year 
            ORDER BY COUNT(CASE WHEN delay_days > 0 THEN 1 END) DESC
        ) AS year_delay_rank

    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
    WHERE delay_days > 0  -- Only count rows with actual delays
    GROUP BY department, first_name, last_name, student_year, section
)
SELECT * 
FROM ranked_students
WHERE department_delay_rank <= :Top OR year_delay_rank <= :Top
ORDER BY department, student_year, delay_count DESC;

datasets.name: f9ef5c39
datasets.query:
SELECT CASE 
           WHEN FLOOR(delay_days / 10) * 10 >= 50 THEN '50+' 
           ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 + 5) 
       END AS delay_range,
       COUNT(*) AS count 
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table 
WHERE delay_days > 0 
GROUP BY CASE 
             WHEN FLOOR(delay_days / 10) * 10 >= 50 THEN '50+' 
             ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 + 5) 
         END
ORDER BY CASE 
             WHEN delay_range = '50+' THEN 9999 
             ELSE CAST(SPLIT(delay_range, '-')[0] AS INT) 
         END

datasets.name: 8788745f
datasets.query:
SELECT department, round(AVG(delay_days),0) as avg_delay FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table 
WHERE delay_days > 0 
GROUP BY department

datasets.displayName: Pending Fine Amount Distribution Across Department
datasets.query:
WITH StudentFine AS (
    SELECT
        Student_ID,
        Department,
        SUM(Fine_Amount) AS Total_Pending_Fine
    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
    WHERE payment_status = 'pending'  -- Only include pending fines
    GROUP BY Student_ID, Department
)
SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN Total_Pending_Fine BETWEEN 0 AND 1000 THEN '0-1000'
        WHEN Total_Pending_Fine BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000 THEN '1000-2000'
        WHEN Total_Pending_Fine BETWEEN 2001 AND 3000 THEN '2000-3000'
        ELSE '3000+'
    END AS Fine_Amount_Bin,
    Department,
    COUNT(Student_ID) AS Student_Count
FROM StudentFine
GROUP BY Fine_Amount_Bin, Department
ORDER BY Fine_Amount_Bin, Student_Count DESC;

datasets.name: 37f84a0d
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 >= 30 THEN '30+'
        ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 + 5)
    END AS delay_range,
    COUNT(*) AS count
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table
WHERE delay_days > 0
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 >= 30 THEN '30+'
        ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(delay_days / 5) * 5 + 5)
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN delay_range = '30+' THEN 9999 
        ELSE CAST(SPLIT(delay_range, '-')[0] AS INT) 
    END

datasets.name: 9f55c0e7
datasets.query:
SELECT subject_year, department, round(AVG(delay_days)) as avg_delay 
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table
WHERE delay_days > 0 
GROUP BY subject_year, department

datasets.name: 933d4a5b
datasets.query:
WITH RankedBooks AS (
    SELECT 
        book_title,
        department,
        SUM(delay_days) AS total_delay,
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY SUM(delay_days) DESC) AS delay_rank
    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table
    WHERE delay_days > 0
    GROUP BY book_title, department
)
SELECT 
    book_title,
    department,
    total_delay,
    delay_rank
FROM RankedBooks
WHERE delay_rank <= 10  -- Optional: Limits to top 10 per department
ORDER BY department, delay_rank

datasets.name: ad29ea2f
datasets.query:
WITH RankedStudents AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        student_id,
        first_name,
        last_name,
        student_year,
        SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fine_paid,
      
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY SUM(fine_amount) DESC) AS rank
    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
    WHERE payment_status = 'paid'  -- Only consider paid fines
    GROUP BY department, student_id, first_name, last_name, student_year
)
SELECT 
    department,
    student_id,
    CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name, ' (', 
           CASE 
               WHEN student_year = 1 THEN '1st Year'
               WHEN student_year = 2 THEN '2nd Year'
               WHEN student_year = 3 THEN '3rd Year'
               WHEN student_year = 4 THEN '4th Year'
               ELSE CAST(student_year AS STRING) || 'th Year'
           END, ')') AS student_name,
    total_fine_paid,
   
    rank
FROM RankedStudents
-- WHERE rank <= 5
ORDER BY department, rank

datasets.name: a0e16539
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100 > 1000 THEN '1000+'
        ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100, '-', FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100 + 100)
    END AS price_range,
    COUNT(DISTINCT book_id) AS count
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.books_transaction_table
WHERE book_price >= 500
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100 > 1000 THEN '1000+'
        ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100, '-', FLOOR(book_price / 100) * 100 + 100)
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN price_range = '1000+' THEN 9999 
        ELSE CAST(SPLIT(price_range, '-')[0] AS INT) 
    END

datasets.name: b26277ad
datasets.query:
WITH RankedStudents AS (
    SELECT 
        department,
        student_id,
        first_name,
        last_name,
        student_year,
        SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fine_paid,
      
        DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY department ORDER BY SUM(fine_amount) DESC) AS rank
    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
    WHERE payment_status = 'pending'  -- Only consider paid fines
    GROUP BY department, student_id, first_name, last_name, student_year
)
SELECT 
    department,
    student_id,
    CONCAT(first_name, ' ', last_name, ' (', 
           CASE 
               WHEN student_year = 1 THEN '1st Year'
               WHEN student_year = 2 THEN '2nd Year'
               WHEN student_year = 3 THEN '3rd Year'
               WHEN student_year = 4 THEN '4th Year'
               ELSE CAST(student_year AS STRING) || 'th Year'
           END, ')') AS student_name,
    total_fine_paid,
   
    rank
FROM RankedStudents
-- WHERE rank <=5
ORDER BY department, rank

datasets.name: b2811147
datasets.query:
SELECT 
    CASE WHEN FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5 >= 20 THEN '20+' 
         ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5 + 5) END AS transaction_range,
    COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS student_count
FROM (
    SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count
    FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table 
    GROUP BY student_id
) subquery
GROUP BY CASE WHEN FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5 >= 20 THEN '20+' 
              ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5, '-', FLOOR(transaction_count / 5) * 5 + 5) END
ORDER BY CASE WHEN transaction_range = '20+' THEN 9999 ELSE CAST(SPLIT(transaction_range, '-')[0] AS INT) END

datasets.name: 89ba6cb6
datasets.query:
SELECT CASE 
            WHEN student_year = 1 THEN '1st'
            WHEN student_year = 2 THEN '2nd'
            WHEN student_year = 3 THEN '3rd'
            WHEN student_year = 4 THEN '4th'
            ELSE CONCAT(COALESCE(student_year, 'Unknown'))
            END as student_year, COUNT(*) AS delay_count
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
WHERE delay_days > 0
GROUP BY student_year

datasets.name: 56a03b6e
datasets.query:
SELECT department,
       round(AVG(delay_days)) AS avg_delay,
       SUM(CASE WHEN payment_status = 'paid' THEN fine_amount ELSE 0 END) AS total_fine
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
WHERE delay_days > 0
GROUP BY department

datasets.name: 68ba178a
datasets.query:
SELECT student_year, final_status, COUNT(transaction_id) AS count
FROM `lms-catalog`.gold.students_transaction_table
GROUP BY student_year, final_status
ORDER BY student_year
